hero_content.text: An experience where we transform your story into permanent art

portfolio_section.title: PORTFOLIO
portfolio_section.cta_label: Do you want to start creating your own?

our_studio.title: The story behind
our_studio.paragraph_1: It all started with a clear idea: to create a space where the art of tattooing transcended the conventional. We didn't want to be just a studio, but a benchmark for quality, creativity and meaning. From the first stroke until today, we have built a brand with its own identity, where each piece is a unique work, thought out and designed to tell stories.
our_studio.paragraph_2: The motivation has always been the same: to provide each person with an experience that goes beyond the ink on the skin. We believe in tattoos as an expression of identity, a symbol of who we are and what we want to carry with us forever.

stories.paragraph_1_california: From California to Cali, Rome embarked on a journey to transform his arm into a canvas of strength and tradition. His Maori-style sleeve is more than a tattoo; it's a symbol of identity, culture, and connection to his roots. Every stroke, every pattern, tells a story that now stays with him forever.
stories.paragraph_2_california: If you want to see a little more about Rome's life and his tattoo after time, you can check it out on his Instagram: @romegoodwin.

stories.paragraph_1_pensilvania: Maddie traveled to our studio with a clear idea: she wanted a tattoo that represented her free spirit and inner strength. Her fairy with a sword is the perfect combination of delicacy and power, a work full of detail and depth that reflects her essence. A design as unique as she is.
stories.paragraph_2_pensilvania: If you want to see a little more about Maddie's life and her tattoo after time, you can check it out on her Instagram: @m.deegs.

stories.paragraph_1_luisiana: Emanuel decided to take his passion to the next level by tattooing the symbol of his audiovisual production company. A ribbon intertwined with an old-fashioned recording camera represents the beginning of his journey in the industry, a reminder of his vision and creativity. More than just a tattoo, it's an emblem of his hard work and dreams come true.
stories.paragraph_2_luisiana: If you want to see a little more about Emanuel's life and his tattoo after time, you can check him out on his Instagram: @legroom_productions.

do_you_want_to_work.title: Do you want to work with us?
do_you_want_to_work.paragraph: Join our team. We're looking for tattoo artist at least 5 years of experience and a creative portfolio. At Legacy Studios, we value the talent and the passion for art
